CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1959, pg. 2 reads: "School Guard Needed - In order to emphasize to the city that a school guard is needed at the corner of Reed and Breckenridge Sts. where in recent past, two school children have been struck by cars, mothers turned out last week to escort their children across the intersection during trips to and from school. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children, including boy wearing crossing guard sash, and women, gathered at the corner of Reed and Breckenridge Streets, with brick row houses with front porches in background, Hill District
